short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find IP address details such location, country, city, geo-location, etc

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IP Info is a Chrome extension that allows you to quickly obtain information about a given IP address. 
With IP Info, you can view the IP address of any website you visit, as well as information about country, region, longitude, latitude, Timezone, ISP, etc.,

The extension is easy to use and provides accurate and up-to-date information about the IP you have given. 

It is particularly useful for web developers, network administrators, and anyone who is interested in getting the details of the IP
